    Class Description
    ActivityLoginBinding  
    ActivityLoginResponseBinding  
    ActivityNavigationBinding  
    Album
    Data Transfer Object that passes info from the API to the Application in regards to Album Information
    AppBarMainBinding  
    Artist
    Data Transfer Object that passes info from the API to the Application in regards to Artist Information
    BardApplication
    Instantiates Bard as an Application that extends the Application class.
    BardDatabase
    Class representing the Database.
    BardDatabase.Converters
    Class holding Converter Methods for Various data types
    BuildConfig  
    ContentMainBinding  
    FragmentMusicBinding  
    FragmentSessionBinding  
    FragmentTaskTypeBinding  
    FragmentTaskTypeDialogBinding  
    ItemCurrentTaskBinding  
    ItemSongBinding  
    ItemTaskBinding  
    LoginActivity
    Activity used to Login to the app and refresh ID tokens to stay logged in
    LoginResponseActivity
    Activity for answering the response for authorization for login
    MusicFragment
    Fragment for the Music pulled from the Spotify Service
    MusicViewModel
    Framework for what to display in the Music Fragment
    NavHeaderMainBinding  
    NavigationActivity
    Activity used for Navigation through the app, using the Navigate Framework
    SessionFragment
    Fragment for the current Session
    SessionFragmentDirections  
    SessionViewModel
    Framework for what to display in the Session Fragment
    Song
    Song entity stored in the database along with attributes, fields, foreign keys, and indices.
    SongAdapter
    Adapter for correctly displaying Songs in the MusicFragment.
    SongDao
    The SongDao provides the CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functions, as well as specialized queries for the repository.
    SongRepository
    Repository for handling the interaction between the Song Dao and the Music ViewModel
    SpotifyServiceProxy
    Service Proxy for Incorporating Spotify Service and Endpoints
    SpotifyServiceProxy.InstanceHolder  
    SpotifySignInService
    Class for Authorization services provided by the Spotify API and Sign-in functionality
    Task
    Task entity stored in the database along with attributes, fields, foreign keys, and indices.
    TaskAdapter
    Adapter for correctly displaying Tasks in the SessionFragment.
    TaskAdapter.DeleteClickListener
    Interface for the Delete button displayed for each task
    TaskDao
    The TaskDao provides the CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functions, as well as specialized queries for the repository.
    TaskRepository
    Repository for handling the interaction between the Task Dao and the Session and TaskType ViewModels
    TaskType
    TaskType entity stored in the database along with attributes, fields, foreign keys, and indices.
    TaskTypeAdapter
    Adapter for correctly displaying TaskTypes in the TaskTypeFragment
    TaskTypeAdapter.AddClickListener
    Interface for the Add button displayed for each task
    TaskTypeAdapter.DeleteClickListener
    Interface for the Delete button displayed for each task
    TaskTypeAdapter.EditClickListener
    Interface for the Edit button displayed for each task
    TaskTypeDao
    The TaskTypeDao provides the CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functions, as well as specialized queries for the repository.
    TaskTypeDialogFragment
    Fragment for Dialog when editing and creating new TaskTypes
    TaskTypeDialogFragmentArgs  
    TaskTypeDialogFragmentArgs.Builder  
    TaskTypeFragment
    Fragment for the current Session
    TaskTypeFragmentDirections  
    TaskTypeFragmentDirections.OpenDialog  
    TaskTypeViewModel
    Framework for what to display in the Session Fragment
    TaskTypeWithTasks
    POJO for TaskTypes with their Tasks
    TaskWithType
    POJO for Tasks with their TaskTypes
    TracksResponse
    Data Transfer Object for translating the items received from the web service in terms of Track Information
    TracksResponse.Item
    Nested Class for defining the Items received by the Web Service
    User
    User entity stored in the database along with attributes, fields, foreign keys, and indices.
    UserDao
    The UserDao provides the CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functions, as well as specialized queries for the repository.
    UserRepository
    Repository for handling the interaction between the Task Dao and the Session and TaskType ViewModels
